speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0002/2008 ) by Mr Guardans Cambó, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the EU’s strategy to deliver market access for European companies ( 2007/2185(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0002/2008 ) by Mr Guardans Cambó, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on the EU’s strategy to deliver market access for European companies ( 2007/2185(INI) ).
agenda_item: EU Market access for European Companies (debate)
